name: Ultra SCSIcide
description:
This is an improved version of SCSIcide.

The improvements are:
  • Support for joysticks
  • Fixed the flicker that occurred at the beginning of each level.
  • Changed background and data bit colors to make bits easier to distinguish.
  • Reduced track size from ten to eight bits.
  • Speed increase per level has been changed so that only two random data bits increase in speed each level.
  • Modified sound and scoring routines to account for the game going for longer and to higher levels.
  • Changed the title screen text and added logos for Grand Idea Studio and Pixels Past.
  • Added PAL support.
  • New label and manual cover
